name: RhythmDrive
description:
In the far-flung future, faster-than-light travel has been discovered, through the traversal of "RhythmSpace".

Engage your space-ship's "rhythmdrive" and take to the stars!

Swerve left and right, avoiding the "bad-beats", while making sure to collect the good vibe energy. 

  • If you hit too many bad-beats, your ship will be destroyed
  • If you miss too many good vibes, you'll lose the beat and be flung into the nowhere, never to be heard from again.

Make it to the end of the song and arrive safely!

Controls
  • Left and Right Arrow Keys - Move side to side to dodge the bad-beats and line up with the good vibes.
  • Space - Tap to collect the good vibes, when their center hits the line!
  • Escape - Quit

(This game was produced simultaneously for DOMEjam 2020, as a demonstration of the kind of games which can be made with DOME,  as well as notGDCjam2020.)
